attr.title: Thwack
attr.desc: Funky-legged tennis game. Thwack demo/jam files are already included and ready to go. Optionally, you can purchase the full game and play that instead.
attr.inst: The full game is available for purchase at https://jontopielski.itch.io/thwack. To run the full game, down ThwackLinux.zip, extract it, and copy the Thwack.pck file into the gamedata directory. This supports the ThwackLinux.zip, Apr 28 2023 release
